max_cell_dist.description: Maximum cell size for domain splitting (meters)
max_cell_dist.title: Max Cell Dist

iso_classes.description:
Separation of sound levels for isosurfaces. Default is:
35.0,40.0,45.0,50.0,55.0,60.0,65.0,70.0,75.0,80.0,200.0
iso_classes.title: Iso Classes

smooth_coefficient.description:
This coefficient (Bezier curve coefficient) 
will smooth the generated isosurfaces. 
If equal to 0, it disables the smoothing step.
smooth_coefficient.title: Smooth Coefficient

TrafficFlow.description:
User-friendly traffic flow parameters for a road segment.

Required fields:
- At least one vehicle count (light or heavy)
- Speed for each provided vehicle count

Optional fields:
- Medium vehicles
- Motorcycles (light and heavy)
- All associated speeds

medium_vehicles_day.description: Medium heavy vehicles, delivery vans > 3.5t, buses per hour (6-18h)
medium_vehicles_day.title: Medium Vehicles Day

heavy_vehicles_day.description: Heavy duty vehicles, buses with 3+ axles per hour (6-18h)
heavy_vehicles_day.title: Heavy Vehicles Day

studded_tires_months.description: Months per year with studded tires (0-12)
studded_tires_months.title: Studded Tires Months

studded_tires_ratio.description: Ratio of vehicles with studded tires (0-1)
studded_tires_ratio.title: Studded Tires Ratio

TrafficFlow.title: TrafficFlow
